Name: Locations Summary Page Header
Body: Places in your community such as schools, hospitals, offices, parks, shops, shelters, places of worship, etc which contribute to its resilience

Name: Organizations Summary Page Header
Body: Community Based, Faith Based, Volunteer, Government, Business

Name: Activities Summary Page Header
Body: Events which are planned within your community that can contribute to its resilience

Name: People Summary Page Header
Body: Different groups of people who need to be considered to make your community more resilient

Name: Evacuation Routes Summary Page Header
Body: Information such as roads and routes to get people to safety in case of certain emergencies

Name: Risks Summary Page Header
Body: Environmental factors or situations which make your community less resilient
